Room.Name: Danzig's Cart
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an overturned cart where Danzig the Powermonger resides.
Room.LongDescription: This cart is quite a sight. Danzig sits on his throne, a wooden chair in the center of this reasonable large cart, which has been turned o over and built up to form a simple room with four walls with a piece of heavy cloth over the doorway. Danzig is a leader among the outlaws that you met on your way through the thicket, but he thinks he is a king.
